Description: Fragment of round handle of an Apulian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine grey-buff. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: For the type see Desy, Ph., Les timbres amphoriques de l'Apulie republicaine (Oxford 1989) 179. Known from both sites of Apani and Giancola. P. Palazzo, Le anfore di Apani (Brindisi), Rome 2013, 95-6. Trimmed.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1266)
